text: Self - proclaimed “ two cool dads ” Adam Levine and James Corden did a little joy - riding on last night ’ s “ Carpool Karaoke ” — both on the highways of Los Angeles and on a local racetrack. Along the way, the “ Voice ” mentor and the “ Late Late Show ” host sung some of Levine ’ s Maroon 5 hits, as well as a B - side or two. At one point in the pre - taped sketch, the duo got pulled over by the cops for “ causing a traffic hazard. ” They were let off with a warning.
